name: cybozu-KOF2015
description: app that will be used at the KOF2015 as demo

scripts.clean: npm run clean-js && npm run clean-css
scripts.js: npm run clean-js && npm run compile
scripts.css: npm run clean-css && node-sass --include-path app/scss -o app/css app/scss/kintone.scss && postcss --use autoprefixer -d app/css/ app/css/kintone.css
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run css
